name: Mark Graham
description: I’m James 58 yrs old single with 2 kids from GA but now in Afghanistan for a peace keeping mission and I have been in the service for 20 years now and have been on this mission here for 8 months now and I’m returning home soon in a few months time, I’m a Military Captain 6″1 185.Brown hair and fair in color. I’m a very open minded person,someone who accepts people as they are, I am a fair individual who adapts to changes in life and enjoys life to the fullest,and looking to meet a woman that i can spend the rest of my life with and I’m a God fearing man that seeks God fearing woman in my life as well a woman that believes in herself and I always put God first before herself.Friendship,love and longtime relationship and something more Important may come up in future so if you wouldn’t mind to tell me more about yourself and I will tell you more about myself to in return as well and get to know each other well and see where life will lead us to, One can never tell, But it’s only time and God will time tell so if you are Interested in getting to know me well fine…..Thank You.
